text:
="preserve">Benhur L. Salimbangon (June 3, 1945 – December 24, 2020) was a Filipino politician. He was a member of KAMPI and the One Cebu party. Salimbangon was a member of the House of Representatives of the Philippines from 2007 until 2019. He was born in Cebu City.
Salimbangon died on 24 December 2020 in Cebu City from cancer, aged 75.

annotations.surface_form: House of Representatives of the Philippines
